name: King's Curse
description:
King’s Curse. You play a man who wakes up in the slums of the once great city of Ashlund, now spiralling into ruin. The gates are sealed in gold with no escape. And a gang, led by a man calling himself Cecil, has risen up.

You venture through the slums, the inner city, and palace wards to uncover the truth to the chaos that has befallen Ashlund.

Which of the two endings will you see?

Are you able to free the city that is suffering from the King’s Curse?

A team of two where it is our first time developing a full game and our first game jam. LOTS of fun so thank you for this wonderful oportunity.

Joshua Robertson (Brohmyr) - Art, Programming, Game Dev, Story

Roger Lafontaine (Warlikefury) - Sound, Game Dev, Story
